sn35.94:4.1: This series of verses resembles those attributed to Vardhamāna (Mahāvīra) at Isibhāsiyāiṁ 29. The same series of verses also contains parallels to [snp5.2:3.1](), [sn1.6:3.1](), and [dn2:29.4]() = [mn56:12.2]().
sn35.94:7.1: Following PTS reading: … bhotva saditan ca sadun ca
sn35.94:9.3: For manomaya here, compare thag 21.1, which has Sabbaso gehasitañca vitakkaṁ;
